title: Help I want to get in the Alpha Client but it won't let me!
body: Well the email associated with my account when I created it was at the time my school email address (Yea ik dumb). But since then I had switched high schools which means they terminated it. So when Riot sends the sign up for Alpha to my my e-mail address I literally can't go to it. The same thing goes for when I want to change the e-mail for my account, it sends an e-mail to the address that doesn't exist. I want to help out in alpha, but I can't. How can I fix this!??? {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

In this case (As you're unable to change your email account yourself) you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can help with account related issues.
